perturbation.original_text: Affiliates means subsidiaries or other entities that will be mutually agreed in writing.
perturbation.changed_text: Affiliates means subsidiaries or other entities that will be unilaterally decided by W2E in writing.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition of 'Affiliates' requires mutual agreement in writing. The modified definition allows W2E to unilaterally decide on affiliates, creating a conflict regarding which entities qualify as affiliates and undermining the principle of mutual agreement throughout the contract.

perturbation.original_text: Each party may terminate this Agreement without liability if, despite their best efforts, the parties fail to conclude the Manufacturing  Agreement pursuant to Clauses 10 - 13 of this Agreement within one month from the date of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Each party may terminate this Agreement with a termination fee of 100,000 USD if, despite their best efforts, the parties fail to conclude the Manufacturing Agreement pursuant to Clauses 10 - 13 of this Agreement within one month from the date of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original text allows termination without liability if the Manufacturing Agreement isn't concluded within a month. The modified text introduces a termination fee under the same condition, directly contradicting the 'without liability' clause and creating uncertainty about the financial consequences of failing to conclude the agreement.

perturbation.original_text: 2.2 The Parties acknowledge and agree that the Objectives are not contractually binding upon the Parties and shall only be referenced to the extent  that there is any inconsistency or ambiguity in this Agreement, in which case the Parties shall attempt to resolve that inconsistency or  ambiguity by having regard to the Objectives.
perturbation.changed_text: 2.2 The Parties acknowledge and agree that the Objectives are fully contractually binding upon the Parties and shall be referenced to the extent that there is any issue in this Agreement, in which case the Parties shall resolve that issue by adhering to the Objectives.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specifies that the Objectives are non-binding and only referenced in cases of inconsistency. The modified text makes the Objectives fully binding and primary for resolving any issue, directly contradicting the original intent and creating uncertainty about the weight and enforceability of the Objectives.
